attributes.review: The apps format is completely all over the place the fonts are different from page to page??? and the menu is very confusing. immediately after downloading the app loaded very slowly and had a lot of glitches when coming to personal data and uploading my documents. I do not recommend vote blue no matter who 2020
attributes.title: the app not good

attributes.review: This app reflects Donald Trump’s morals. Horrible, skewered and overall POOR. It seems like out of the millions of dollars he couldn’t bother to find anyone to actually make a good app for him- or maybe all the people who are intelligent decided that they couldn’t contribute to his negative cause. Overall the app is terrible and even worse it started off with a picture of some random  orange orge. Strange. Anywho- Dethrone Facism
attributes.title: Trash App!!!!

attributes.review: Honestly who designed the app? It looks horrible, it also uses personal info against you if you refuse to vote for trump. I absolutely hated it as i was spammed with emails and messages threatening my poor minority life. Trying to send me across the world to china because since im chinese i somehow have the chinese virus. Absolutely horrible. I couldnt even see anything with the yellow words on the bright orange background. Terrible
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: I download the app to keep my self Inform during the election and before the election because our president is the MOST RELIABLE SOURCE of information out there and HE CAN’T POSSIBLY lied to us. But as soon as I put my phone number I started to get random phone call and they had all of my information. Information that I never put in social media or nor where else
attributes.title: Worse app in the App Store.

attributes.review: After downloading this app I received a text from the campaign asking for my credit card information and then my social security number!! Not only this but this app causes me phone to crash several times and I will get around 50 notifications everyday. Do not download. This app needs to be taken off the App Store.
attributes.title: So disappointing

attributes.review: I decided to get the app so I could follow what he was saying because the news made him sound like he was speaking gibberish. Turns out he actually talks like that😬😬. I’ve been thinking a lot recently that he may need medical attention because it is getting extremely noticeable that he sounds like a dying pig. Can’t wait to watch him burn in hell🥰🥰🥰
attributes.title: Very disgusting. Do not recommend.

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in hopes of getting information directly from the source and sidestepping the normal lib fake news mumbo jumbo. THIS APP WAS NOT HELPFUL!  It does not seem like it’s run by Donald J. Trump. They’ve been asking me for money 3 times a day even after deleting the app. It seems like they’re pulling their info right from CNN?!? I don’tknow?! 

Mr. President if you are reading this please fix this!! We want to support you!!
attributes.title: THIS SEEMS LIKE A SCAM?!

attributes.review: This app is horrible first it took two weeks to download 😠 I didn’t mind at first because I didn’t care but then it wouldn’t let me open any other apps which made me kinda sad 😢 anyways, when it did download it wouldn’t let me open my eyes which made me sad because I gotta keep an eye out for selener 👁👄〰️ BUT I COULDN'T 〰️👄〰️😤😡 so I don’t recommend this app
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: absolutely horrible. this app has nothing interesting except the president asking for money for his campaign which will certainly fail. i do NOT recommend this app if you are anyone other than a republican. even if you're a republican, you shouldn't get this app. it's just a billionaire begging for money. boring. 0/10, would not get again.
attributes.title: horrible.

attributes.review: This app is the worst. They stole all of my information and gave it to a random person who then STALKED me. I had to change my name, number, and location. 0/10. I do not recommend. It also takes a LONG time to download and then when it downloads, it takes a long time to get updated. Honestly really wack. Do not get this app.
attributes.title: No thank you
